Quickstrike:





Quickstrike tilted his head and pondered how he was going to do this. He 
wasn't the right bot to do this job, with the handi-cap on his hands. They 
weren't built for this operation.

He turned his head to Dark Mouse, not sure how to explain. He held his 
mismatched hands out, showing her both the arm that ended with the wide 
hooded cobra and the other with eight exremely long fingers.

"Maybe you should work th' angles, eh?" he said, drawing back his arms. The 
strips of metal at his cheeks quivered lightly.
